Articles.Content:
Hello!

This is the 2nd craft of mine what I publish, called Aurora, a Single Stage To Orbit / Crew Return Vehicle. Enjoy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1h2bt5b1kdtv0i9/Aurora%20SSTO-CRV.craft?dl=1)

![Aurora.jpg?raw=1](https://www.dropbox.com/s/bw2m9vdbq1zm2ma/Aurora.jpg?raw=1)
Looks quite cool! You may want to add a basic description of abilities etc.

Well, three isn't much I can say. It is pretty stable in atmosphere, turns well, it can reach orbit with no problem (you can see my fuel left on the image after getting to a 130k circular orbit), it has a regular clamp o tron docking port and rcs thrusters for up-down and forward-backward translations (for turning you have the reaction wheels and control surfaces). It has some solar panels on it's back as well. It's main purpose to get a crewman into space and be able to return. It is designed small and relatively light, so you can dock a few to space stations and use it as a personal transport or escape vehicle. That's about it. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
